name: Area ready for works (grids setout, area accessible and approval to start)
Current Dimensioned Slab Set Out Drawings numbers and revisions recorded
Correct pipe laid to specified level and grade (all joints sealed correctly as specified)
All relevant test plugs removed where applicable
Specified Protection Around All feeds/pipes penetrating slab
All relevant under slab works completed, reviewed and approved
Bedding depth and material correct & compacted
Correct manhole installed to specified height and sitting level
Joints & connections correctly sealed as specified
Concrete Lid Installed and sitting appropriately
Cast Iron Lid Installed and sitting flush
Any formwork/ debris removed from area
Any waterproofing/ drainage / service requirements completed and inspected
Approval given to commence backfill - attach any other relevant inspections and observations closedout
General photos and observations during backfill
Backfill completed correctly and heights checked/ correct
Clip spacing to manufacturer's specs horizontal/ vertical
Clip spacing to manufacturer's specs horizontal/ vertical
Area acceptable and ready for work to begin
Pump mounted on base, &  housing condition good - no leaks
Alignment checked (field alignment performed where required)
All isolation valves set correctly - non return valve, isolation valve
All power and control wiring correctly installed
All electrical connections correct and tight
Controls point to point check completed
invert - mid level for dual pump operation
Clip Spacing to manufactures specs horizontal/ vertical
Line strainer fitted between pump & tank
Visual check (for leaks form valves, tees, saddles, etc)
Council inspector sign off and date

Pressure 1500 kpa or as per spec
